description: This table contains the associated information about the criteria for determining the estimated date of delivery for this pregnancy.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the episode record (HSB .1).

columns.name: OB_DT_EVENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The event or criterion that identifies this line in the dating table.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Other Basis


Last Menstrual Period


Est. Date of Conception


Embryo Transfer


Ultrasound


Uterus Size


Quickening


Fundal Ht. at Umbil.


FHR with Doppler


FHR with Fetoscope


Patient Reported


Alternate EDD Entry

columns.name: OB_DT_DTESYS_DT
columns.description: The system-calculated date when this event occurred.

columns.name: OB_DT_DTEUSR_DT
columns.description: The date when this event occurred, as entered by the user.

columns.name: OB_DT_GA_SYS
columns.description: The gestational age at which this event is expected to occur, as calculated by the system. This value represents the gestational age in days.

columns.name: OB_DT_GA_USR
columns.description: The gestational age at which this criterion did occur, as specified by the user. This value represents the gestational age in days.

columns.name: OB_DT_EDDSYS_DT
columns.description: The estimated date of delivery based on this criterion, as calculated by the system.

columns.name: OB_DT_EDDUSR_DT
columns.description: The estimated date of delivery based on this criterion, as entered by the user.

columns.name: OB_DT_WRKEDD_YN
columns.description:
If this column is yes, then the current event is the one that is considered the working estimated date of delivery for this pregnancy.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: OB_DT_ENTINS_TM
columns.description: The instant this row was entered and saved.

columns.name: OB_DT_ENTUSR_ID
columns.description: The user who has entered the information for this specific dating event.

columns.name: OB_DT_CYC_LN
columns.description: The patient's average menstrual cycle length.

columns.name: OB_DT_LUT_LN
columns.description: The average length of the menstrual cycle's luteal phase.

columns.name: OB_DT_AFTOVU
columns.description: The number of days after ovulation that conception occurred.

columns.name: OB_DT_BTHCTL_YN
columns.description:
If yes, the patient was on birth control at the time of conception.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: OB_DT_WRKEDD_YN

columns.name: OB_DT_DTEPREC_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item represents the uncertainty of the date in column OB_DT_DTEUSR_DT. Category table ZC_OB_DT_DTEPREC maps the category numbers to their names.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Exact Date


Within Days


Within Weeks


Within Months


Within Years


LMP Unknown


Approximate

columns.name: OB_DT_REASONCHNG_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item contains the user-supplied reason for changing the working EDD of a pregnant patient. This improves the auditing of pregnancy dating events.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Data entry error


Other (Comment)
